revision.comment: Fix description too; that is Timothy's description, not Tevick's
revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Peasant | class = Peasant4 | game = Strife | doomednum = 65 | convid = 9 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:StrifeHumanoid|StrifeHumanoid]]→[[Classes:Peasant|Peasant]]→Peasant4
A peasant who wears a red-colored tunic. He is Harris on MAP02 and MAP33, and is Tevick on MAP23. {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP02/33 || {{dw|Harris}} || Cannot be trusted, doing his quest early can prevent any further progress. |- | MAP23 || {{dw|Strife minor characters - Hub 3#Tevick|Tevick}} || Tevick is the salesman in the small room above the tavern who sells [[Classes:ShadowArmor|Shadow Armor]]. |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant4 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 0 {{Property|Speed}} 7 }
